TextView.android:text: Dinner: Homemade Chicken Nuggets, with Broccoli

1 chicken breast 1 egg 2 slices wheat bread Salt and pepper 1 cup brocolli
- Defrost the chicken - Preheat the oven to 375 degrees - Cut the chicken into little pieces of your choice - tenders, nuggets, etc. - Whisk the egg in a bowl - Toast the bread slices. Then, using a bread knife and your hands, cut and crumple them into breadcrumbs. - Sprinkle them with salt and pepper. - Dip each piece of chicken into the egg, and then roll both sides of it in the breadcrumbs. Place all of the nuggets onto a lightly greased baking tray. - Bake the nuggets for 20 minutes, or until coooked through. - Enjoy with brocolli on the side, per the package's instructions.
